content: with the soothing rhythm of simple stitches the blissful scarf is a relaxing make for all experience levels and a great introduction to tunisian crochet by combining the flowing gradient colour of scheepjes stone washed flow xl with the two-tone effect of regular stone washed xl colours shift gently across the fabric to create a soft painterly look measuring approximately 23 x 178 cm this rectangular scarf offers a versatile length that s easy to wrap loop or drape each short edge is finished with a neat border of double_crochet stitches while the natural density of tunisian crochet gives the fabric a snug woven feel that s especially comforting on cooler days although the yarn has a woolly appearance it contains no wool making it a thoughtful choice for anyone with sensitive skin who still enjoys the look and feel of a cosy textured accessory the full written pattern is available in english uk crochet terms with us conversions and dutch and is free to download via scheepjes com **materials** * scheepjes stone washed flow xl 65% cotton 35% acrylic 65g/97 5m ​**yarn a** 07 bliss x 2 yarn cakes * scheepjes stone washed xl 70% cotton 30% acrylic 50g/75m ​**yarn b** 841 moonstone x 3 balls * 8mm tunisian crochet hook * 5mm crochet hook
